meanings.sent1: His constant nincompoopery in class made the teacher frustrated.
meanings.sent2: The nincompoopery of his decision to jump off the roof was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The nincompoopery of trying to fit a square peg into a round hole was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her nincompoopery in handling delicate situations was like watching a bull in a china shop.
meanings.sent5: The sheer nincompoopery of his actions left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: The state of being a nincompoop
meanings.sent1: His constant display of nincompoopery annoyed his friends.
meanings.sent2: Living in a state of nincompoopery is not conducive to success.
meanings.sent3: The nincompoopery of forgetting his own birthday was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She wore her nincompoopery like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The undeniable nincompoopery of his behavior was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The meeting was filled with nincompoopery, making it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring the instructions was pure nincompoopery.
meanings.sent3: The nincompoopery of trying to teach a fish to climb a tree was evident.
meanings.sent4: His words were lost in a sea of nincompoopery.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the stench of nincompoopery after his ridiculous speech.
